languages.text: "Будет жаль терять такого ценного специалиста. Я приговариваю тебя к пожизненному заключению на складах десятины, где ты будешь вести ее учет и опись. В одиночестве".
"It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."
languages.original_text: "Будет жаль терять такого ценного специалиста. Я приговариваю тебя к пожизненному заключению на складах десятины, где ты будешь вести ее учет и опись. В одиночестве".

traits.locale_text: "It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to do work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."
"It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to do work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."
"It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."
"It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."
"It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."
"It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."

languages.text: "Es wäre doch ein Jammer, eine so wertvolle Mitarbeiterin zu verlieren. Ich verurteile Euch zur Arbeit in den Zehntlagern, deren Inhalt Ihr in völliger Einsamkeit bis zum Tag Eures Todes katalogisieren werdet."
languages.original_text: "It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."

traits.locale_text: "Es wäre doch ein Jammer, eine so wertvolle Mitarbeiterin zu verlieren. Ich verurteile Euch zur Arbeit in den Zehntlagern, deren Inhalt Ihr in völliger Einsamkeit bis zum Tag Eures Todes katalogisieren werdet."

languages.text: « Il serait regrettable de perdre une professionnelle aussi compétente. Je vous condamne à travailler dans les entrepôts de la dîme, où vous cataloguerez leur contenu dans la solitude jusqu'à la fin de vos jours. »
languages.original_text: "It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."

traits.locale_text: « Il serait regrettable de perdre une professionnelle aussi compétente. Je vous condamne à travailler dans les entrepôts de la dîme, où vous cataloguerez leur contenu dans la solitude jusqu'à la fin de vos jours. »

languages.text: “若是失去像你这么有价值的专业人士，那就太遗憾了。我判处你在什一税仓库里工作，独自整理资源清单，直到你生命结束的那一天为止。”
languages.original_text: "It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."

traits.locale_text: “若是失去像你这么有价值的专业人士，那就太遗憾了。我判处你在什一税仓库里工作，独自整理资源清单，直到你生命结束的那一天为止。”

languages.text: «Sería una lástima perder a una profesional tan valiosa. La sentencio a trabajar en el almacén del diezmo, donde catalogará el contenido en soledad hasta que le llegue la muerte».
languages.original_text: "It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."

traits.locale_text: «Sería una lástima perder a una profesional tan valiosa. La sentencio a trabajar en el almacén del diezmo, donde catalogará el contenido en soledad hasta que le llegue la muerte».

languages.text: 「こんな貴重な専門家を失うのは惜しい。君には租税倉庫での勤務を命じる。そこで、一人孤独に中身の目録を死ぬまでつけ続けるがいい」
languages.original_text: "It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."

traits.locale_text: 「こんな貴重な専門家を失うのは惜しい。君には租税倉庫での勤務を命じる。そこで、一人孤独に中身の目録を死ぬまでつけ続けるがいい」

languages.text: "Mesleğinde böylesine uzman bir profesyoneli kaybetmek büyük ziyan olur. Seni aşar ambarlarında çalışmaya mahkûm ediyorum. Bundan sonraki ömrünü, bir başına erzak fihristleyerek geçireceksin."
languages.original_text: "It would be a pity to lose such a valuable professional. I sentence you to work in tithe storages, where you will catalogue their contents in solitude until the day you die."

traits.locale_text: "Mesleğinde böylesine uzman bir profesyoneli kaybetmek büyük ziyan olur. Seni aşar ambarlarında çalışmaya mahkûm ediyorum. Bundan sonraki ömrünü bir başına erzakları fihristleyerek geçireceksin."
